overview: The fourth film "Mezhyhirya. Batina's Hut". While working on a film about Viktor Yanukovych's residence, director Yulia Shashkova visited Mezhyhirya several times. the authors of the film draw parallels between life in luxurious Mezhyhirya and simple Yenakiyevo, where Viktor Yanukovych's parents ' house is in ruins.
title: Mezhyhirya. Batina Hut
